backend/main.mo: Defines actor with authorization and blob storage mixins managing listings, edit/delete requests, user profiles, and listing ID generation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping multi-select location filter updates to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file including components, hooks, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global style tokens defining color variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React application and mounting it to the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router route tree and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and select a role before continuing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Route guard that blocks access based on authentication and required role, showing an access denied message.
App layout wrapper rendering header, footer, and the active routed page.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders a footer with current year, branding, and a Caffeine.ai credit link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Displays the site header with navigation links and conditional dashboard options based on user role.
frontend/src/components/listings/Filters: Provides interactive filters for listings including price, location, type, facilities, and rental durations.
frontend/src/components/listings/Listing: Shows a clickable card preview of a listing with photo, type badge, location, and price.
Form for creating or editing listings, handling title, price, location, type, facilities, durations, and description.
frontend/src/components/listings/PhotoGa: Displays listing photos with thumbnails and a modal viewer supporting navigation.
frontend/src/components/moderation/EditR: Compares original and edited listing fields, highlighting changes with side‑by‑side views.
frontend/src/components/photos/PhotoMana: Manages photo uploads, previews, removal, and upload progress for listings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches backend actors based on identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Provides hooks for fetching and updating the caller’s profile and role, and exposes login/logout utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on listings, photos, and moderation requests using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles and defines a blue-themed light/dark design system via CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAllListing: Shows all listings for admins with status badges and actions to approve pending listings. Provides links to view details and create new listings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCreateList: Admin form page to create new listings with validation, photo uploads, and submission logic. On success it navigates back to the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRequestsQu: Displays moderation queues for edit and delete requests, allowing admins to approve or reject with reasons. Uses tabs to switch between edit and delete request lists.
Admin layout with navigation and role gating for managing listings and requests.
frontend/src/pages/ListingDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed listing information including photos, pricing, facilities, and rental options.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerCreateList: Owner-facing page to create new listings with form inputs and photo uploads. Submits listing data and returns to the owner dashboard on success.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerEditReques: Allows owners to request edits to an existing listing by preloading current data and submitting revised fields and photos. Sends an edit request for admin approval.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerMyListings: Shows listings belonging to the logged‑in owner with status indicators and actions to view or request edits. Encourages creation of a listing if none exist.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerRequestsPa: Displays the logged-in owner's edit and delete requests with status badges and optional rejection reasons.
Owner dashboard layout with role-gated navigation for managing personal listings and requests.
frontend/src/pages/PublicListingsPage.ts: Displays public listings with search, filtering, sorting, and pagination, showing only approved listings. Uses memoized filtering logic and UI controls for location, price, facilities, and more.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Provides helper functions to format numbers as Indonesian Rupiah and parse Rupiah strings into numbers.
frontend/src/utils/imageValidation.ts: Validates uploaded images by checking MIME type and enforcing a 5MB size limit.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, container settings, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, features, architecture notes, and known issues for a property listing application.
